sn16.12:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca mahākassapo āyasmā ca sāriputto bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye.
sn16.12:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā mahākassapena saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn16.12:1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ etadavoca:
sn16.12:1.4: “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso kassapa, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn16.12:1.7: “Kiṃ panāvuso, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn16.12:1.10: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn16.12:1.12: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn16.12:1.13: “Kiṃ panāvuso, neva hoti, na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn16.12:1.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn16.12:1.17: “Na hetaṃ, āvuso, atthasaṃhitaṃ nādibrahmacariyakaṃ na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati.
sn16.12:2.7: “Etañhi, āvuso, atthasaṃhitaṃ etaṃ ādibrahmacariyakaṃ etaṃ nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
